public class Haberdashery
extends Object
An open Haberdashery.

Haberdashery(Repository)
Construct a Haberdashery in a given Repository.
Haberdashery(String)
Construct a Haberdashery in a Repository identified by its filename.

checkPoint()
Make sure anything we've done to the Haberdashery is saved.
close()
Close a Haberdashery.

Delete a directly designated object from the Haberdashery.

Delete an indirectly designated object from the Haberdashery via a designated root unit.
delete(Designator, Unit)
Delete an indirectly designated object from the Haberdashery via a given root unit.
determine(Designator, Unit)
Determine the DirectDesignator that currently corresponds to a given IndirectDesignator via a given root unit.

Enumerate all the objects in the Haberdashery.

Fetch an indirectly designated object from the Haberdashery via a given root unit.

Haberdashery 
  public Haberdashery(Repository rep)
Construct a Haberdashery in a given Repository.
Parameters:
rep - The Repository containing the Haberdashery.
Haberdashery 
  public Haberdashery(String filename)
Construct a Haberdashery in a Repository identified by its filename. This is principally for development and diagnostic purposes and should be removed prior to product ship as it is most definitely not capability secure.
Parameters:
name - The filename of the Repository file.

init 
  public void init()
Initialize a Haberdashery to its empty state. This won't really do the right thing, since any other junk that is in the Repository will still be there. Think of it like erasing a floppy disk by rewriting the directory sectors. In a better version this will be integrated with the Repository open/create operation, so that we'll all be happy and safe.
close 
  public void close()
Close a Haberdashery. This is probably not ideal and should be replaced with something that is smarter and more automatic.
checkPoint 
  public void checkPoint()
Make sure anything we've done to the Haberdashery is saved.
get 
  public HaberdasheryObject get(Designator what)
Fetch a directly designated object from the Haberdashery.
Parameters:
what - The (direct) Designator of the object to fetch.
Returns:
The designated HaberdasheryObject.
get 
  public HaberdasheryObject get(Designator what,
                                Designator root)
Fetch an indirectly designated object from the Haberdashery via a designated root unit.
Parameters:
what - The (indirect) Designator of the object to fetch.
root - The (direct) Designator of the Unit to resolve the path.
Returns:
The designated HaberdasheryObject.
get 
  public HaberdasheryObject get(Designator what,
                                Unit rootUnit)
Fetch an indirectly designated object from the Haberdashery via a given root unit.
Parameters:
what - The (indirect) Designator of the object to fetch.
rootUnit - A root Unit to resolve the path.
Returns:
The designated HaberdasheryObject.
determine 
  public DirectDesignator determine(Designator what,
                                    Unit rootUnit)
Determine the DirectDesignator that currently corresponds to a given IndirectDesignator via a given root unit.
Parameters:
what - The (indirect) Designator of the object of interest.
rootUnit - A root Unit to resolve the path.
Returns:
The DirectDesignator of the indirectly designated object.
delete 
  public void delete(Designator what)
Delete a directly designated object from the Haberdashery.
Parameters:
what - The (direct) Designator of the object to delete.
delete 
  public void delete(Designator what,
                     Designator root)
Delete an indirectly designated object from the Haberdashery via a designated root unit.
Parameters:
what - The (indirect) Designator of the object to delete.
root - The (direct) Designator of the Unit to resolve the path.
delete 
  public void delete(Designator what,
                     Unit rootUnit)
Delete an indirectly designated object from the Haberdashery via a given root unit.
Parameters:
what - The (indirect) Designator of the object to delete.
rootUnit - A root Unit to resolve the path.
isFullyDetermined 
  public boolean isFullyDetermined(Designator what,
                                   Unit rootUnit)
Test if a Designator is fully determined in this Haberdashery.
Parameters:
what - The Designator of the object we are interested in
rootUnit - The root unit for fetching indirectly designated objects.
Returns:
true iff the designated object is fully determined.
isFullySpecified 
  public boolean isFullySpecified(Designator what,
                                  Unit rootUnit)
Test if a Designator is fully specified in this Haberdashery.
Parameters:
what - The Designator of the object we are interested in
rootUnit - The root unit for fetching indirectly designated objects.
Returns:
true iff the designated object is fully specified.
put 
  public DirectDesignator put(HaberdasheryObject obj)
Toss a new object into the Haberdashery.
Parameters:
obj - The HaberdasheryObject to add.
Returns:
A DirectDesignator for the object.
putRoot 
  public void putRoot(Unit rootUnit)
Write or update the root Unit object.
Parameters:
The - new instance of the root Unit object to store.
elements 
  public Enumeration elements()
Enumerate all the objects in the Haberdashery. This is for debugging purposes only and should be taken out before first product ship
